NetResult Internal Reference:  AELTC_NRID12756 
 
Please quote the above AELTC_NRID12756 reference in all communications
with us regarding this issue. 
 
 
Dear Sirs, 
 
Audio Visual Infringement 
 
We have noticed that your Web Site, http://www.menstennisforums.com/ is
displaying Wimbledon audiovisual (A/V) content. 
 
All copyright in Wimbledon A/V content is exclusively owned by The All
England Lawn Tennis & Croquet Club (AELTC) and or its exclusive
production partners.  As you have neither sought nor obtained permission
from AELTC to use this content, your present use is an infringement of
The AELTC's rights.  Please immediately cease all such infringements on
any and all of your web sites and confirm to us via email that you have
done so. 
 
Please confirm immediately, by return, your undertaking to cease all
such infringements on any and all of your web sites.   
 
Formal Declaration  
 
I, Jonny Hartley, as a representative of NetResult, hereby swear, under
penalty of perjury under the laws of the United States of America, that
the information in this notification is accurate and that NetResult is
authorised to act on its behalf with respect to internet monitoring and
compliance.  
 
 
Please note that nothing in this letter is intended or shall be
construed to constitute an express or implied waiver of any of The
AELTC's rights or remedies, all of which are expressly reserved. 
 
We thank you for your cooperation. 
 
 
 
Yours faithfully, 
  
 
Jonny Hartley 
 
NetResult
A Division of Projector NetResult Ltd
Mulberry House
583 Fulham Road
London
UK SW6 5UA 
  
 
Tel:  
 
  
 
Please note, if this email has been sent to the wrong recipient, please
accept our apologies, inform us of the error, and forward this e-mail
immediately to the correct person or department for action.
